name: Tennis (itch) (kris40k)
description:
I decided to start developing with the Unity game engine, so as part of that process, I developed a fan game version of Pong that you can play in the browser. I used assets available from Zenva Academy's courses on Unity Development. 

Instructions:

  • Player 1 uses the "W" and "S" keys to control their paddle
  • Player 2 uses the Up and Down arrow keys.
  • "Space" to start the game.
  • You may need to click on the game window set focus when starting.

As of right now, it is local multiplayer only, best 3 out of 5 to win. I may revisit this for AI and networking development later, and add single player and on-net multiplayer later, but no promises at this time, as this is just a toy project. 

Thanks for playing!
